statements: DELETE FROM shipment_statuses WHERE shipment_id = 100 AND status = 'delivered';
DELETE FROM shipments WHERE shipment_id = 100 AND last_updated < '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM tracking_updates WHERE update_id = 50 AND update_timestamp > '2021-05-15';
DELETE FROM customers WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM tracking_updates WHERE shipment_id = 100 AND update_id < 10;
DELETE FROM shipments WHERE shipped_date < '2023-01-01' AND status = 'delivered';
DELETE FROM shipment_events WHERE shipment_id = 100 AND event_type = 'Delivered';
